subject: [Analysis] Check if paraphrasing matters vs just more epochs
description:
Experimental question: Can we get same signal from N epochs on same question instead of N paraphrases?

Compare:
- k=5 paraphrased questions (current)
- k=5 identical questions
- Look at consistency scores, detection performance

This could simplify the method if paraphrasing doesn't add value.

Lower priority - only if time permits.
